document.full_text: senator richard blumenthal, democrat of connecticut, sent a follow-up letter to sony on tuesday after the company found that more of its  servers had been hacked.
document.title: senator presses sony on theft of customer data
lines_and_colors: senator richard blumenthal, democrat of connecticut, sent a follow-up letter to sony on tuesday after the company found that more of its  servers had been hacked.
